_source.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
_source.long_desc: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.
_source.target_audience: physicians, physician executives, clinical managers, practice managers, office administrators, healthcare executives, c-levels, hospital administrators, nurse practitioners, physician assistants

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Automated Patient Payments, & Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
related_products.features:
Best for 11+ Provider Groups

Full Patient Engagement Suite, Telehealth & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

related_products.short_desc: Send secure intake and consent forms privately to your clients. HIPAA compliant, e-signature support, online booking and payment
related_products.features:
IntakeQ provides beautiful and secure electronic intake forms for health professionals, enabling them to offer an amazing onboarding experience, while also optimizing and streamlining the intake process.

As a bonus, IntakeQ also offers powerful practice management features, including scheduling, payment, appointment reminders, secure messaging, telehealth, invoicing and insurance billing.

Affordable pricing, 14-day free trial, no credit card required, no software to install.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: More time for consultations. Happier clients. Less effort. vcita: HIPAA compliant software designed for your practice. Free Trial!
related_products.features: Nurture your patient relationships with a powerful HIPAA complient CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and patients in one centralized online hub. Get a birds-eye view of your patients' history appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app and easily collaborate with your team, assigning patients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that provides secure messaging and automated reminder system.
related_products.features: Engage your patients using HIPAA-compliant patient portal that gives access to personal health records, provides real-time patient data updates, secure messaging, and automated reminder system.

related_products.short_desc: Our easy-to-use solution helps you engage and connect with your patients and deliver the best virtual care.
related_products.features: PatientPop combines telehealth, communications, and patient intake in a streamlined platform to help you deliver quality care and build lasting relationships with your patients. Combined with Practice Growth Foundation, our solution makes it easy for you to attract patients and retain them for life. We also integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience.

related_products.short_desc: Our EHR and all-in-one solutions for all practice sizes include patient engagement tools like Telehealth, Patient Portal and more.
related_products.features: ModMed? offers a suite of Patient Engagement tools for practices of all sizes to help increase patient loyalty and add convenience for the following medical specialties: Allergy, Dermatology, ENT, GI, OBGYN, Ophthalmology, Orthopedics, Pain Management, Plastic Surgery, Podiatry and Urology. Patient engagement tools include Telehealth, Patient Portal, Patient Self-Scheduling, ModMed Kiosk, Patient Reminders and Patient Surveys.

related_products.short_desc: Cerner Ambulatory supports more than 55 specialties by delivering integrated clinical and financial solutions and services.
related_products.features: Cerner's PowerChart Ambulatory EHR ensures the right clinicians have the right information at the right time and place to make the best possible decisions. We believe that with information technology and coordination, health care becomes safer, more effective and available to communities worldwide.

Continuously improve your practice with powerful reporting

similar_products.short_desc: Take patient and member relationships to new heights with Salesforce Health Cloud.
similar_products.features: Health Cloud is the trusted, connected platform to power the business of health. By bringing together clinical and non-clinical data into a single source of truth, Health Cloud helps organizations gain a 360-degree view of each customer to elevate the health experience, drive proactive engagement, and influence the best outcomes. Health Cloud equips employees with purpose-built apps, automated industry workflows, and AI-powered customer insights to boost efficiency, collaboration, and growth

This includes all functions related to scheduling, billing, patient medical records, telehealth, document management, lab integrations, analytics, and much more.

similar_products.features: Human API is a real-time health intelligence platform enabling companies to build new solutions that deliver better experiences to customers. We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: TigerConnect is the healthcare industry's most widely adopted, HIPAA-compliant clinical collaboration and patient engagement platform.
similar_products.features: TigerConnect is the healthcare industry's most widely adopted communication solution for care collaboration and patient engagement. TigerConnect offers provider-and patient-friendly texting, video, and voice communication while adhering to HIPAA-compliance and HITRUST standards for security and privacy. Improve care and outcomes by easily reaching patients and families for follow-up, virtual care, and plan adherence. Enable patients to reach you for virtual visits through a digital front door.

similar_products.short_desc: HIPAA compliant faxing, email, SMS, forms and signatures with seamless EMR integration.
similar_products.features:
Healthcare providers: It's time to upgrade your faxing solution.
Medsender is an easy-to-use, HIPAA-compliant online fax solution with seamless EMR integration. 

Our optional automation feature is capable of automatically uploading incoming faxes to the corresponding patient charts and notifying the appropriate staff. 

Users can keep their existing fax numbers or get new numbers from Medsender with their preferred area codes.

similar_products.short_desc: Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution that delivers award-winning short-form video content.
similar_products.features:
Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution. Mytonomy works with leading institutions to elevate the patient experience, engage patients across the care continuum, and expand access to critical care across diverse populations. 

Their solution delivers award-winning short-form video content combined with intelligent surveys and dynamic communications proven to engage and empower patients with high satisfaction.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Management software incorporates solutions for bed availability management, patient tracking throughout the facility, be it a hospital or a smaller healthcare clinic, and patient queue management for various healthcare organizations. For related software solutions see Patient Case management software and Healthcare Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Portal software makes it possible for healthcare providers and hospitals to securely connect and communicate with patients online. With Patient Portal software, your patients can take care of their billing and invoicing, view their electronic health records and fill out important intake and insurance forms. Looking for other innovative software to manage your medical practice? Check out Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software, and Patient Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Personalization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Personalization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Personalization software is used to customize visitor experience on a website. Personalization software generates targeted recommendations and notifications that are presented to customers during their web browsing sessions.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features and reports. Free 21 day trial
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: Experience best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more.
related_products.features: Experience superior efficiency and health record integrity with seamlessly integrated cloud based EMR, patient engagement, and billing in DrChrono's integrated platform. Take your charting to the next level with best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, along with telemedicine, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more. With pre-built customizable medical forms and smart shortcuts, you can speed up your charting and focus on your patient care.

related_products.short_desc: Enjoy patient data right at your fingertips. Order lab tests and prescriptions in just a few clicks. Stay MU compliant with NueMD EHR.
related_products.features: NueMDs ONC-ATCB Certified electronic health record offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to internet based technology just like our practice management system. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. Chart, code, and share information with other providers and lab systems simply and quickly. NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our succes

related_products.short_desc: Document, schedule, bill, and market to your patients with WebPT, the leading software platform for outpatient physical therapists.
related_products.features: WebPT is the leading EMR software for outpatient physical, occupational, and speech therapy. With 40% market share, WebPT offers scheduling, documentation, billing, outcomes tracking, business reporting, patient engagement tools, and system integrations, WebPT's robust web-based solution is ideal for every outpatient setting regardless of staff size, facility type, or the number of specialties.

related_products.short_desc: AdvancedEHR: Save time & improve clinical outcomes with seamless data transfer, simple charting, ePrescribing, and telemedicine tools.
related_products.features: AdvancedMD EHR/EMR: Practice from anywhere. Run your entire practice from a single program, a single database and a single login. Seamless integration of your clinical & business technologies helps your staff chart, manage tasks, compare data & report for Meaningful Use or MACRA with ease. Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
related_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Medical Record (EMR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations with at least 40 users. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
similar_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
similar_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

similar_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.

Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

similar_products.short_desc: CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow.
similar_products.features:
CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow. Charts helps physicians become more productive and profitable, while maintaining adaptability and adjusting to the frequent changes in healthcare reform.

Our MU-certified EHR that features real-time patient flows, rich patient summaries, built-in templates, and time-saving clinical documentation to help you treat more patients every day, more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect and share current health information from medical records, labs, pharmacies, devices, apps, and patient portals

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management, EHR, and billing services for behavioral, mental, and chemical health. Cloud-based, feature-rich, affordable.

Comprehensive, yet easy to use, Procentive EHR is cloud-based and ONC certified.

similar_products.short_desc: AlexiaHtC is a new and affordable EMR/EHR, that is, Internet electronic medical record/electronic health record.
similar_products.features: AlexiaHTC is a modern, integrated, and affordable medical application for solo doctors, small practices, and independent nurse practitioners: EMR/EHR, E-Prescribing, Telemedicine, Medical Billing, Imaging DICOM VIEWER, Laboratory Integration, Provider Connectivity, and Patient Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusion is an EMR built specifically to help OTs, PTs, & SLPs spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.
similar_products.features:
From Pediatrics to Geriatrics, Fusion EMR does it all for PTs, OTs & SLPs Practices! Features include billing, scheduling, waitlists, insights, teletherapy, documentation, and more to streamline your clinic!

Thousands of therapists across the country trust Fusion's EMR to make them (and their practices) more efficient.

Sign up for a free demo of Fusion today to find out how you can spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.

similar_products.short_desc: TriMed offers a fully integrated software suite including EHR, PM, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, & Telemedicine.
similar_products.features: TriMed offers a complete software suite which includes Electronic Health Records, Practice Management, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, and Telemedicine. Our products are fully integrated, so all modules seamlessly work together for your practice. Extremely robust. Very customizable. Template driven. We build our software around your workflow, not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers.
similar_products.features: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers. Complete quick and easy charting with smart-fill and speech to text functionality. Set up autopay and require payment prior to your session to increase revenue. Schedule a demo today to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: TenEleven's electronic Clinical Record (eCR) solution provides the framework to thrive in a performance-based payment system.

_source.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.

With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet is an online work execution platform that empowers healthcare organizations to track, manage, and report on information by improving collaboration, ensuring secure
data, and increasing visibility. With its familiar spreadsheet format, Smartsheet enables teams to easily get started and effectively collaborate. Plus, securely share, store, and access PHI while meeting or exceeding all of HIPAA's regulatory requirements.

related_products.short_desc: 10to8 is Appointment Scheduling Software trusted by hospitals, clinics, NHS Trusts, and more. Improve the patient flow with 10to8.
related_products.features:
Allow patients to schedule & manage their appointments with 10to8.

Forecast service demand & keep your clinics from getting overcrowded. Provide a safe environment for patients & staff alike while increasing productivity & efficiency.

Increase hospital appointment attendance: 10to8's automated accessible appointment reminders are proven to reduce DNAs by 90%.

Gain performance insights with reports on no-shows, service demand, busy times. Keep patient information safe with HIPAA tools.

related_products.short_desc: Caspio is the world's leading NO-CODE platform for building compliant healthcare applications without having to write code.
related_products.features: Caspio is the leading NO-CODE application development platform. Create hospital management software tailored to your exact requirements - from patient engagement to revenue cycle management and inventory control. Caspio is HIPAA-compliant and can help you achieve HL7/FHIR data portability across your entire ecosystem. See why Caspio is trusted by leading healthcare organizations. Try FREE.

related_products.features: TheWorxHub by Brightly Software (formerly Dude Solutions) is a cloud-based, mobile solution to help you prioritize, manage and complete compliance-related maintenance management. With TheWorxHub, you can more efficiently manage your operations, including work orders, asset tracking, compliance tasks, preventive maintenance, inventory and housekeeping. Our award-winning CMMS helps 1,600+ healthcare and senior living organizations improve building maintenance to provide long term care.

related_products.short_desc: The leading critical communication and data platform trusted to help save lives.

What is CareStat?
A comprehensive post-acute analytics solution that connects acute care providers, ACOs, and physician
groups with skilled nursing (SNF) and home health agencies (HHA) to better manage patient outcomes,
operations, clinical protocols, and utilization.

health and SNF providers, supported by SHP unique quality measures, to better manage patients across
the continuum of care.

Forecast service demand & keep your clinics from getting overcrowded. Provide a safe environment for patients & staff alike while increasing productivity & efficiency.

Increase hospital appointment attendance: 10to8's automated accessible appointment reminders are proven to reduce DNAs by 90%.

Gain performance insights with reports on no-shows, service demand, busy times. Keep patient information safe with HIPAA tools.

similar_products.short_desc: VectorCare is a fully customizable, no-code patient logistics platform for patient transfer centers to schedule any service.
similar_products.features: VectorCare is a fully customizable, comprehensive patient logistics platform. VectorCare provides Providers with the critical tools to build and manage a patient transfer center.

similar_products.short_desc: Empowering facilities management teams for over 30 years with powerful asset management and maintenance solutions.
similar_products.features: TMA Systems provides facilities and asset management solutions that can be easily configured to your needs. For more than 30 years, TMA has provided reliable, intelligent and trusted software solutions that help facility executives deliver value by reducing downtime, increasing maintenance productivity, improving equipment reliability and saving money. Our flagship product WebTMA provides the functionality you need to manage your capital assets while optimizing maintenance team productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: TA+ assists clinics, community hospitals, MTSO's, and health systems, including Acute, Medical, Behavioral Health, and Social Services.
similar_products.features: Arrendale's Transcript Advantage (TA+) is a fully HIPAA-compliant cloud-based application suite for clinical document management. We deliver multiple dictation methods, front and back-end speech-to-text, HL7, a robust word processor with workflow management and transcript grading, keyword search, eSign, and multiple delivery methods plus EHR integration. With a modular deployment and affordable volume-based pricing, TA+ provides the best value, newest features and great reliability.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Long Term Care software automates the operations of nursing homes and long term care facilities. Managers use Long Term Care applications to improve the efficiency and accuracy of their administrative functions. Long Term Care software offers a variety of flexible features which assist in the management and organization of patient records, billing and invoicing and staff and appointment scheduling. Long Term Care software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Billing software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.
